message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a great deal for both!
I understand you want a fair deal, but waiting is risky for both of us. How about we split the difference of a 60-40 split in my favor to compensate for the inflation?
I see you want to compensate for inflation, but I still think I can get a better deal. Meet me in the middle of our previous offers.
Alice, we're running out of time and losing money!  This is the exact midpoint of our last two offers. Let's settle this now before we both lose out further.
